summary: The diff indicates the requested Gallery “All files” bulk-select toggle was added in GallerySection, and supporting project/meta summary files were updated. No explicit missing REQ items are evident from the provided diff summary, but the diff also includes unrequested metadata/documentation updates that describe unrelated changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) in project_state.json that are not part of the requested UI feature implementation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for the Gallery UI change; it does not request adding/updating project_state tracking items.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation/summary claims of many unrelated frontend changes (theme, upload queue, header/footer, hooks changes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest scope explicitly forbids changing other application functionality beyond adding the “All files” option; the modified summary file describes a wide range of unrelated feature work not requested (even if only as text).
